page.features.title: üéàFeatures to be launched on January 31, 2024
page.features.content:
1: Custom multi-layer Fn
2: DKS - Dynamic Key Stroke
3: MT - Multi Function Key Press
4: TGL- Switch Triggering
index.profileLimit: The exclusive config limit has been reached(count:3)
index.importProfileLimit: The exclusive config limit has been reached(count:3),Please delete unnecessary configuration files first.
index.resetDefaultProfileAlertContent: After restoring factory settings, you can restore the initial configuration by resetting the exclusive config!
index.layerExplain:
Layer1: Fn
Layer2: Fn + Shift
Layer3: Fn + Shift + Alt
rapidTrigger.sensitivityExplain:
Rapid Trigger Sensitivity Settings: 
The higher the sensitivity, the faster the triggering.There are 20 levels of sensitivity in total, with level 1 being the lowest and level 20 being the highest.
rapidTrigger.oneKeySensitivitySettingsSu: Please select the button first.(Hold down the left mouse button and drag or click to select)
rapidTrigger.advanceExplain: Click to open the advanced settings. The advanced settings can separately set the key strokes for pressing and lifting.
rapidTrigger.advanceSensitivityExplain:
Rapid Trigger Advanced Settings: 
The stroke of pressing and lifting the button can be set independently.
Stroke adjustment range: 0.1mm-4mm
Adjust resolution: 0.1mm
rapidTrigger.advanceSettingsSubTitle: Please select the button first.(Hold down the left mouse button and drag or click to select)
rapidTrigger.oneKeyResetAlertContentText: After reset, all key sensitivity will become global sensitivity
After reset, all button make/break strokes will become global make/break strokes
macro.numberMax: the duration can only be set to a maximum of 1000ms
macro.executeType0: Press and hold the button to execute until the button is released to stop execution
macro.executeType1: Click the key to execute until the key is clicked again to stop execution
macro.deleteAllAlertTitle: Whether to delete all macro data?
macro.deleteAllAlertContent: Notice,Deleting all macro data cannot be undone!
advance.tips: (Please click the key to select the advanced key function that needs to be bound)
advance.DKSExplain: 4 different actions on a single key based on key position. Activate 1 up to 4 bindings on 4 different parts of the key press.
advance.MTExplain: 2 different actions on a single key based on press behaviour. Hold the key down for the first action or tap the key for the second action.
advance.LGTExplain: Lock an action between its on and off state by tapping the key. Activate the normal key behaviour by holding down the key.
advance.triggerPosExplain: Set the actuation point for the first and last DKS action. Named ‚ÄúStart of the key press‚Äù and ‚ÄúRelease of the key‚Äù respectively.
advance.pressTimeExplain: (Enable to customize the default 200ms hold duration before the "hold" key is activated)
advance.RSExplain: Rappy Snappy monitors the 2 selected keys andactivates whichever key is pressed downfurther.
advance.STExplain: Snappy Tappy (socD cleaning) monitors the 2selected keys and activates them based on youchosen settings.
advance.sensitivity: Activating Rapid Trigger ensures keys are only compared in an active state. Go to the Performance tab to tweak the sensitivity of Rapid Trigger.
advance.socdList0: Select what happens when both keys are activated.
advance.socdTypeExplain: For a more natural feel, when both keys are fullypressed simultaneously, the system will registerboth inputs as normal.
advance.socdMsg: Snappy Tappy (SOCD) and Rappy Snappy  can only have one
